Audio: 10..perfect!
Video : 9.5 ...  there's a few loss of detail  but it's just minor... still very watchable IMHO.. plays fine with MPC.. turned on a few shaders and it looks very good... totally better than most 1gb low res avi rips... thanks for this riddlerA!..

The movie is good.. I watch this as someone who admires karate kid's old movie... so it makes it hard for me to like it.. in the end I kinda like it... totally worth watching.. and I'm gonna burn it to dvd for my niece and nephews.. it's very hard nowadays to get a movie suitable for the whole family..

Here's some image sample... taken with MPC with enabled Combine Shader : Sharpen complex 2, denoise, 16-225 -> 0-225... there's not much difference with enabled shaders, i enabled it to make my monitor color better...
